name: ralsng
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wral(s0, csn(c0), w0), w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wral(s0, csn(c0), w0), w1))

-| diffsc(s0, c0)

comment: Substitution expressed in terms of quantification over a singleton. (Contributed by NM, 14-Dec-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2015.) (Proof shortened by AV, 7-Apr-2023.)
